about_the_game:
Step into the paws of brave and mischievous RATS in this charming action-adventure game from Tavern Rat Studios. Set within the nooks and crannies of a typical neighborhood and bustling community, "Mischief" brings back the magic of co-op gaming with a modern twist.


Exciting Co-op Challenges
  • Team up with up to four players in local multiplayer mode.
  • Face imaginative household bosses like Shovul: Scourge of the Sandbox and Oscar: Pup of the Pit.
  • Use everyday objects like crayons and ketchup creatively to interact with foes.


Fun and Diverse Minigames
  • Engage in an intricate platforming challenge that tests your agility.
  • Navigate a tricky race course designed for competitive fun.
  • Compete in a shooting gallery to showcase your precision and skill.
  • & More Coming Soon!!!


Engaging Exploration and Rewards
  • Explore vibrant, detailed environments from a rat’s perspective.
  • Solve a variety of puzzles that require teamwork and creativity.
  • Earn over 100 unique achievements to celebrate your accomplishments.


Immerse Yourself in the World of Mischief
  • Enjoy detailed, hand-crafted 3D art that brings the world to life.
  • Listen to a delightful, immersive soundtrack that sets the mood.
  • Join our community for updates, tips, and shared adventures.

short_description: Mischief is a delightful and imaginative action/adventure video game where you step into the paws of a courageous rat, navigating through a captivating world within the nooks and crannies of a typical home and a bustling backyard solo or with up to four local players!
